item.title: What does it mean to contribute to the hacker culture?
item.description: Hacker and doubt Over time I matched the hacker culture with the culture of doubt. So contributing to the hacker culture would mean contributing to the culture of doubt. But I guess this doesnâ€™t mean a lot. In this regard, I would start from the relationship between hackers and doubt. Who is a hacker? A definition of hacker that goes straight to the point is: A hacker is nothing but a person who loves to understand how things work.
